utils module

utils.draw_bar_chart(x_axis_list, y_axis_list, x_axis_label='', y_axis_label='', title='', font=None)

function that allows to draw bar chart easily

Parameters

  • x_axis_list – list of data to be shown on x-axis of bar graph

  • y_axis_list – list of data to be shown on y-axis of bar graph

  • x_axis_label – label on x-axis

  • y_axis_label – label on y-axis

  • title – Title of bar graph

  • font – font of labels on either side of bar graph

utils.draw_pie_chart(labels, data, title='')

function that allows to draw pie chart easily

Parameters

  • data – represents the array of data values to be plotted, the fractional area of each slice is represented by data/sum(data). If sum(data)<1, then the data values returns the fractional area directly, thus resulting pie will have empty wedge of size 1-sum(data).

  • labels – labels is a list of sequence of strings which sets the label of each wedge.

  • title – Title of pie chart
